facebook_page_insights.title: page_total_actions
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of clicks on your Page's contact info and call-to-action button.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_post_engagements
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of times people have engaged with your posts through reactions, comments, shares and more.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_fan_adds_by_paid_non_paid_unique
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of Accounts Center accounts that liked your Page for the first time, broken down based on whether the Page like was attributed to paid or organic content. This metric is estimated.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_lifetime_engaged_followers_unique
facebook_page_insights.description: Someone who follows your Page and who has, in the past 14 days, watched one or more of your live or previously recorded videos for at least 1 minute and/or interacted with your video content at least once, via a comment, share, reaction or like.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_daily_follows
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of times your Facebook Page or profile was followed in the selected time period.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_daily_follows_unique
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of Accounts Center accounts that followed your Page in the selected time period. This metric is estimated.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_daily_unfollows_unique
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of Accounts Center accounts that unfollowed your Page in the selected time period. This metric is estimated.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_follows
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of followers of your Facebook Page or profile. This is calculated as the number of follows minus the number of unfollows over the lifetime of your Facebook Page or profile.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_impressions
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of times any content from your Page or about your Page entered a person's screen. This includes posts, stories, ads, as well other content or information on your Page.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_impressions_unique
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of people who had any content from your Page or about your Page enter their screen. This includes posts, check-ins, ads, social information from people who interact with your Page and more. This metric is estimated.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_impressions_paid
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of times any post or story content from your Page or about your Page entered a person's screen through paid distribution such as an ad.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_impressions_paid_unique
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of Accounts Center accounts that saw your ads at least once. Reach is different from impressions, which may include multiple views of your ads by the same Accounts Center accounts. This metric is estimated.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_impressions_viral
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of times any content from your Page or about your Page entered a person's screen with social information attached. Social information displays when a person's friend interacted with your Page, post or story. This includes when someone's friend likes or follows your Page, engages with a post, shares a photo of your Page and checks into your Page. This metric is in development.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_impressions_viral_unique
facebook_page_insights.description: This metric counts reach from the organic or paid distribution of your Facebook Page and Page content when they were shown with social information attached. Social information is shown on Feed after someone interacts with your Page, post or story. Reach is only counted once if it occurs from both organic and paid distribution. This metric is estimated and in development.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_impressions_nonviral
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of times your Facebook Page and Page content was on screen, excluding when they were shown with social information attached. Social information is shown on Feed after someone interacts with your Page, post or story. This metric is in development.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_impressions_nonviral_unique
facebook_page_insights.description: This metric counts reach from the organic or paid distribution of your Facebook Page and Page content, excluding when they were shown with social information attached. Social information is shown on Feed after someone interacts with your Page, post or story. Reach is only counted once if it occurs from both organic and paid distribution. This metric is estimated and in development.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_media_view
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of times your content was played or displayed. Content includes videos, posts, stories and ads.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_posts_impressions
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of times your Page's posts entered a person's screen. Posts include statuses, photos, links, videos and more.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_posts_impressions_unique
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of people who had any of your Page's posts enter their screen. Posts include statuses, photos, links, videos and more.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_posts_impressions_paid
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of times your Facebook Page and Page content was on screen, attributed to your ads.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_posts_impressions_paid_unique
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of Accounts Center accounts that saw any posts from your Page at least once, attributed to your ads.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_posts_impressions_organic_unique
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of people who had any of your Page's posts enter their screen through unpaid distribution.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_posts_served_impressions_organic_unique
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of people who were served your Page's posts in their Feed whether it entered their screen or not. Posts include statuses, photos, links, videos and more.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_posts_impressions_viral
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of times your Page's posts entered a person's screen with social information attached. Social information displays when a person's friend interacted with you Page or post. This includes when someone's friend likes or follows your Page, engages with a post, shares a photo of your Page and checks into your Page.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_posts_impressions_viral_unique
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of people who had any of your Page's posts enter their screen with social information attached. As a form of organic distribution, social information displays when a person's friend interacted with you Page or post. This includes when someone's friend likes or follows your Page, engages with a post, shares a photo of your Page and checks into your Page.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_posts_impressions_nonviral
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of times your Page's posts entered a person's screen. This does not include content created about your Page with social information attached. Social information displays when a person's friend interacted with you Page or post. This includes when someone's friend likes or follows your Page, engages with a post, shares a photo of your Page and checks into your Page.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_posts_impressions_nonviral_unique
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of people who had any posts by your Page enter their screen. This does not include content created about your Page with social information attached. As a form of organic distribution, social information displays when a person's friend interacted with you Page or post. This includes when someone's friend likes or follows your Page, engages with a post, shares a photo of your Page and checks into your Page.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_actions_post_reactions_like_total
facebook_page_insights.description: Daily total post like reactions of a page.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_actions_post_reactions_love_total
facebook_page_insights.description: Daily total post love reactions of a page.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_actions_post_reactions_wow_total
facebook_page_insights.description: Daily total post wow reactions of a page.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_actions_post_reactions_haha_total
facebook_page_insights.description: Daily total post haha reactions of a page.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_actions_post_reactions_sorry_total
facebook_page_insights.description: Daily total post sorry reactions of a page.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_actions_post_reactions_anger_total
facebook_page_insights.description: Daily total post anger reactions of a page.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_actions_post_reactions_total
facebook_page_insights.description: Daily total post reactions of a page by type.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_fans
facebook_page_insights.description: The total number of people who have liked your Page.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_fans_locale
facebook_page_insights.description: Aggregated language data about the people who like your Page based on the default language setting selected when accessing Facebook.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_fans_city
facebook_page_insights.description: Aggregated Facebook location data, sorted by city, about the people who like your Page.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_fans_country
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of people, aggregated per country, that like your Page. Only the 45 countries with the most people that like your Page are included.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_fan_adds
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of new people who have liked your Page.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_fan_adds_unique
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of Accounts Center accounts that liked your Page for the first time. This metric is estimated.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_fan_removes
facebook_page_insights.description: Unlikes of your Page.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_fan_removes_unique
facebook_page_insights.description: Unlikes of your Page.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_video_views
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of times your Page's videos played for at least 3 seconds, or for nearly their total length if they're shorter than 3 seconds. During a single instance of a video playing, we'll exclude any time spent replaying the video.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_video_views_by_uploaded_hosted
facebook_page_insights.description: Daily video views on a page-level broken down by all variants of page-uploaded and page-hosted variants.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_video_views_paid
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of times your Page's promoted videos played for at least 3 seconds, or for nearly their total length if they're shorter than 3 seconds. For each impression of a video, we'll count video views separately and exclude any time spent replaying the video.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_video_views_organic
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of times your Page's videos played for at least 3 seconds, or for nearly their total length if they're shorter than 3 seconds, by organic reach. During a single instance of a video playing, we'll exclude any time spent replaying the video.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_video_views_by_paid_non_paid
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of times your Page's videos played for at least 3 seconds, or for nearly their total length if they're shorter than 3 seconds, broken down by total, paid, and non-paid. During a single instance of a video playing, we'll exclude any time spent replaying the video.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_video_views_autoplayed
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of times your Page's videos automatically played for at least 3 seconds, or for nearly their total length if they're shorter than 3 seconds. During a single instance of a video playing, we'll exclude any time spent replaying the video.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_video_views_click_to_play
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of times your Page's videos played for at least 3 seconds, or for nearly their total length if they're shorter than 3 seconds, after people clicked play. During a single instance of a video playing, we'll exclude any time spent replaying the video.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_video_views_unique
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of people who viewed your Page's videos for at least 3 seconds, or for nearly their total length if they're shorter than 3 seconds. During a single instance of a video playing, we'll exclude any time spent replaying the video.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_video_repeat_views
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of times your Page's videos were replayed for at least 3 seconds, or for nearly their total length if they're shorter than 3 seconds.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_video_complete_views_30s
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of times your Page's videos played for at least 30 seconds, or for nearly their total length if they're shorter than 30 seconds. During a single instance of a video playing, we'll exclude any time spent replaying the video.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_video_complete_views_30s_paid
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of times your Page's promoted videos played for at least 30 seconds, or for nearly their total length if they're shorter than 30 seconds. For each impression of a video, we'll count video views separately and exclude any time spent replaying the video.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_video_complete_views_30s_organic
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of times your Page's videos played for at least 30 seconds, or for nearly their total length if they're shorter than 30 seconds, by organic reach. During a single instance of a video playing, we'll exclude any time spent replaying the video.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_video_complete_views_30s_autoplayed
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of times your Page's automatically played videos played for at least 30 seconds, or for nearly their total length if they're shorter than 30 seconds. During a single instance of a video playing, we'll exclude any time spent replaying the video.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_video_complete_views_30s_click_to_play
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of times your Page's videos played for at least 30 seconds, or for nearly their total length if they're shorter than 30 seconds, after people clicked play. During a single instance of a video playing, we'll exclude any time spent replaying the video.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_video_complete_views_30s_unique
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of people who viewed your Page's videos for at least 30 seconds, or for nearly their total length if they're shorter than 30 seconds. During a single instance of a video playing, we'll exclude any time spent replaying the video.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_video_complete_views_30s_repeat_views
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of times your Page's videos replayed for at least 30 seconds, or for nearly their total length if they're shorter than 30 seconds.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_video_view_time
facebook_page_insights.description: The total time, in milliseconds, people viewed your Page's video.

facebook_page_insights.title: page_views_total
facebook_page_insights.description: The number of times a Page's profile has been viewed by logged in and logged out people.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_clicks
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of times people clicked on anywhere in your posts without generating a story.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_clicks_by_type
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of times people clicked on anywhere in your posts without generating a story, by consumption type.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_impressions
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of times your Page's post entered a person's screen. Posts include statuses, photos, links, videos and more.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_impressions_unique
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of people who had your Page's post enter their screen. Posts include statuses, photos, links, videos and more. This metric is estimated.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_impressions_paid
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of times your Page content was on screen, attributed to your ads.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_impressions_paid_unique
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of Accounts Center accounts that saw your post at least once, attributed to your ads. This metric is estimated.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_impressions_fan
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of times your Page content was on screen for accounts that followed or liked your Page.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_impressions_fan_unique
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of Accounts Center accounts that followed or liked your Page. This metric is estimated.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_impressions_organic
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of times your post was on screen through organic distribution.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_impressions_organic_unique
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: This metric counts reach from the organic distribution of your Facebook content, including posts, stories and ads. Reach from shares is counted towards organic content only. This includes cases where your content is shared as a story or repost. This metric is estimated.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_impressions_viral
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of times your Page content was on screen with social information attached. Social information is shown on Feed after someone interacts with your Page, post or story. This metric is in development.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_impressions_viral_unique
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: This metric counts reach when your Facebook content was shared as a repost or story. Reach from shares only counts towards organic distribution. This metric is estimated and in development.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_impressions_nonviral
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of times your Page content was on screen, excluding when your content was shown with social information attached. Social information is shown on Feed after someone interacts with your Page, post or story. This metric is in development.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_impressions_nonviral_unique
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: This metric counts reach from the organic or paid distribution of your Page content, excluding when your content was shown with social information attached. Social information is shown on Feed after someone interacts with your Page, post or story. Reach is only counted once if it occurs from both organic and paid distribution. This metric is estimated and in development.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_media_view
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of times your content was played or displayed. Content includes videos, posts, stories and ads.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_reactions_like_total
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: Total like reactions of a post.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_reactions_love_total
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: Total love reactions of a post.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_reactions_wow_total
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: Total wow reactions of a post.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_reactions_haha_total
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: Total haha reactions of a post.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_reactions_sorry_total
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: Total sad reactions of a post.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_reactions_anger_total
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: Total anger reactions of a post.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_reactions_by_type_total
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: Total post reactions by type.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_video_avg_time_watched
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The average time, in milliseconds, people viewed your videos. Only available for videos created after August 25th 2016. Returns 0 for reshared videos.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_video_complete_views_organic
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of times your videos played from the beginning to 97%, or more, of its length, by organic reach. During a single instance of a video playing, we'll exclude any time spent replaying the video. Returns 0 for reshared videos.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_video_complete_views_organic_unique
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of people who viewed your videos from the beginning to 97%, or more, of its length, by organic reach. During a single instance of a video playing, we'll exclude any time spent replaying the video. Returns 0 for reshared videos.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_video_complete_views_paid
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of times your promoted videos played from the beginning to 97%, or more, of its length. For each impression of a video, we'll count video views separately and exclude any time spent replaying the video. Returns 0 for reshared videos.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_video_complete_views_paid_unique
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of people who viewed your promoted videos from the beginning to 97%, or more, of its length. For each impression of a video, we'll count video views separately and exclude any time spent replaying the video.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_video_retention_graph
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of times your videos played at each interval as a percentage of all views. Videos are divided into 40 equal intervals. This metric does not count impressions while the video was live. Retention graphs may show more impressions later in the video than at the beginning. People might start the video in the middle, skip ahead, save, and rewatch it from that point, or other similar behaviors.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_video_retention_graph_clicked_to_play
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of times your videos played at each interval as a percentage of all views, after people clicked play. Videos are divided into 40 equal intervals. This metric does not count impressions while the video was live. Retention graphs may show more impressions later in the video than at the beginning. People might start the video in the middle, skip ahead, save, and rewatch it from that point, or other similar behaviors.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_video_retention_graph_autoplayed
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of times your videos automatically played at each interval as a percentage of all automatic views. Videos are divided into 40 equal intervals.This metric does not count impressions while the video was live. Retention graphs may show more impressions later in the video than at the beginning. People might start the video in the middle, skip ahead, save, and rewatch it from that point, or other similar behaviors.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_video_views_organic
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of times your videos played for at least 3 seconds, or for nearly their total length if they're shorter than 3 seconds, by organic reach. During a single instance of a video playing, we'll exclude any time spent replaying the video.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_video_views_organic_unique
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of people who viewed your videos for at least 3 seconds, or for nearly their total length if they're shorter than 3 seconds, by organic reach. During a single instance of a video playing, we'll exclude any time spent replaying the video.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_video_views_paid
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of times your promoted videos played for at least 3 seconds, or for nearly their total length if they're shorter than 3 seconds. For each impression of a video, we'll count video views separately and exclude any time spent replaying the video.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_video_views_paid_unique
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of people who viewed your promoted videos for at least 3 seconds, or for nearly their total length if they're shorter than 3 seconds. For each impression of a video, we'll count video views separately and exclude any time spent replaying the video.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_video_length
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The length, in milliseconds, of a video post.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_video_views
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of times your videos played for at least 3 seconds, or for nearly their total length if they're shorter than 3 seconds. During a single instance of a video playing, we'll exclude any time spent replaying the video. This includes live views.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_video_views_unique
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of people who viewed your videos for at least 3 seconds, or for nearly their total length if they're shorter than 3 seconds. During a single instance of a video playing, we'll exclude any time spent replaying the video.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_video_views_autoplayed
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of times your videos automatically played for at least 3 seconds, or for nearly their total length if they're shorter than 3 seconds. During a single instance of a video playing, we'll exclude any time spent replaying the video.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_video_views_clicked_to_play
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of times your videos played for at least 3 seconds, or for nearly their total length if they're shorter than 3 seconds, after people clicked play. During a single instance of a video playing, we'll exclude any time spent replaying the video.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_video_views_15s
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of times your videos played for at least 15 seconds, or for nearly their total length if they're shorter than 15 seconds. During a single instance of a video playing, we'll exclude any time spent replaying the video.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_video_views_60s_excludes_shorter
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of times your videos played for at least 60 seconds. This metric is counted only for videos that are 60 seconds or longer. During a single instance of a video playing, we'll exclude any time spent replaying the video.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_video_views_sound_on
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of times your videos played with sound on for at least 3 seconds, or for nearly their total length if they're shorter than 3 seconds. During a single instance of a video playing, we'll exclude any time spent replaying the video.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_video_view_time
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The total time, in milliseconds, your videos played, including videos played for less than 3 seconds and replays. Returns 0 for reshared videos.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_video_view_time_organic
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The total time, in milliseconds, your videos played by organic reach. Returns 0 for reshared videos.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_video_view_time_by_age_bucket_and_gender
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The total time, in milliseconds, your videos played for your Top Audiences, age and gender.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_video_view_time_by_region_id
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The total time, in milliseconds, your videos played for your Top 45 Locations, Region - Country.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_video_views_by_distribution_type
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of times your videos played by distribution type; page_owned and shared.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_video_view_time_by_distribution_type
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The total time, in milliseconds, your videos played by distribution type; page_owned and shared.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_video_view_time_by_country_id
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The total number of minutes your videos played for your Top 45 Locations; Country.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_video_social_actions_count_unique
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The unique count of the social actions (reactions, comments, shares) on a video post.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_video_complete_views_30s_autoplayed
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of times your videos automatically played for at least 30 seconds, or for nearly their total length if they're shorter than 30 seconds. During a single instance of a video playing, we'll exclude any time spent replaying the video. Returns 0 for reshared videos.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_video_complete_views_30s_clicked_to_play
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of times your videos played for at least 30 seconds, or for nearly their total length if they're shorter than 30 seconds, after people clicked play. During a single instance of a video playing, we'll exclude any time spent replaying the video. Returns 0 for reshared videos.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_video_complete_views_30s_organic
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of times your videos played for at least 30 seconds, or for nearly their total length if they're shorter than 30 seconds, by organic reach. During a single instance of a video playing, we'll exclude any time spent replaying the video. Returns 0 for reshared videos.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_video_complete_views_30s_paid
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of times your promoted videos played for at least 30 seconds, or for nearly their total length if they're shorter than 30 seconds. For each impression of a video, we'll count video views separately and exclude any time spent replaying the video. Returns 0 for reshared videos.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_video_complete_views_30s_unique
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of people who viewed your videos for at least 30 seconds, or for nearly their total length if they're shorter than 30 seconds. During a single instance of a video playing, we'll exclude any time spent replaying the video.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_activity_by_action_type
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of stories created about your Page post, by action type.

facebook_page_posts_insights.title: post_activity_by_action_type_unique
facebook_page_posts_insights.description: The number of people who created a story about your Page post, by action type.

facebook_post_metadata.title: admin_creator
facebook_post_metadata.description: Admin who created the Page post

facebook_post_metadata.title: call_to_action
facebook_post_metadata.description: Call to action type and value

facebook_post_metadata.title: can_reply_privately
facebook_post_metadata.description: Whether the viewer can send a private reply
